document_data.mainbody:
eshal was a dragonsoul of the Cult of the Dragon that operated on the isle of Tuern during the late 15 century DR.
He wielded a massive spear in battle.
Veshal rode atop an enormous red drake.
Some time during the 1480s DR, Veshal was stationed at the entrance to inner reaches of the personal lair of Tuerns red dragon tyrant Lostmauth. He remained there the same time that the Dragon Cults leader Severin Silrajin ventured within to parlay with Lostmauth for the destruction of the city of Neverwinter.
